name: Overview
data: [{"id":"275fea59-1c49-4c90-baff-6162fe6e3d76","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"File Overview: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"definitions.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9eeb7464-2f84-41a3-9c97-b1cfd977031c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"definitions.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module is the heart of the Jarvis analysis engine's state management. It provides a sophisticated framework for modeling how every identifier in a program—be it a variable, function, class, or dictionary—exists and evolves.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"02d6d00d-978c-4d23-a2eb-15f98d9904b3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In static analysis, it is not enough to know that a variable exists; you must track its ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"points-to set","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (the collection of things it could represent) and how that set changes as the code executes line by line. This module provides the data structures to record this \"temporal\" history of code behavior.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6401a043-80d0-4e4d-8ae8-e20eae7f65c7","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"19818dc3-a2db-4891-90e1-e17885371151","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Core Purpose and Role","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"87008fea-2947-4547-ab9d-e17f7e91a495","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The primary goal of this module is to create a dynamic \"Digital Twin\" of the program's memory and structure:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0038201e-e45f-44f3-8959-dba5a70ded38","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Symbolic Representation","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It defines what a \"Definition\" is, categorizing code entities into types like functions, modules, and collections.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fd4f0838-7adc-44bd-a337-42204e914c3b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Temporal Tracking","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It records \"Points,\" which are snapshots of a variable's possible values at specific line numbers.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"425707c0-beeb-4f2f-af16-d6a73623ac17","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Flow Management","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It handles the complexity of control flow (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"while","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" blocks) by deferring and merging changes to variables using a change management system.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"24ee65c3-2aaa-4c81-84b2-7b26d7b2837f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Resolution","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It provides the logic to navigate the lexical hierarchy of a project, allowing the system to understand parent-child relationships between modules and their contents.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9720a3e4-0aa5-4d81-959e-a6b354245001","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"61f489e7-370f-4129-8f32-04115088e43d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Components","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2261a895-cc3c-49b5-8599-0fe882899171","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Registry)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a14e9633-3565-4ef4-8f15-305134024b48","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The central authority that manages the global symbol table. It handles the creation and lookup of all definitions and provides intelligence for resolving complex value chains (e.g., following ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x = y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"y = z","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to find that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ultimately points to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"z","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4ec3c53f-68ca-4486-9d5f-5abc5e0e6606","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Entity)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0e4193a5-c5c9-4c8d-baab-5db3984cc826","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The fundamental object representing a code symbol. It stores its own history of assignments (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PointItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects) and, for collections like lists and maps, maintains a internal \"memo\" of keys and elements.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3b7a2c23-6895-4cbe-aa6f-9370f39b3369","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PointItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Snapshot)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"247f0a0d-4322-418f-95cc-c649403e69c9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A lightweight record of what a definition points to at a specific source code line. These are stored in heaps within definitions to ensure chronological ordering.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5aa4c5d4-96e6-4c9f-ad8d-f55daeff7919","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" & ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Flow Buffer)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f3bbc7b6-eb06-4575-b754-cf0afdb5238f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A specialized subsystem used to track \"potential\" changes. When the analyzer enters a conditional branch, it records changes here instead of the main symbol table. Once the branch is fully analyzed, these changes can be merged back, simulating the effect of the control flow.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e587cd47-4956-4e37-804d-b04ce5219e2f","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionError","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ae3dccf7-578a-4525-818d-eef3d922b9ea","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A custom exception used to enforce the integrity of the symbol table, such as preventing the creation of duplicate namespaces.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"03009a93-4d33-422b-ad33-befb63b8fe27","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"5fa623b5-9f9b-4354-9d2b-e3c777cfa853","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"System Integration & Relationship","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2ad5520b-cc6e-4282-9c07-9ac22e06e1a2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This module serves as the primary data source for the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Analyzer","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"857e365e-fffd-41be-bfde-4f38cef45193","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"AST Discovery","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": As the engine walks the Abstract Syntax Tree, it uses the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to register every function and class it discovers.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"94d72ede-bd88-4f8b-9730-17c8396670ad","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Data Propagation","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": When the analyzer sees an assignment (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a = b","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it creates a new ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PointItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s history that references the values currently held by ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"b","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2f346157-f384-49db-a3cf-04dbdf83fb5f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Inter-procedural Analysis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": When a function is called, the manager helps resolve the \"final\" values of the arguments, passing that data from the caller's definition history to the callee's parameters.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1ab42c1c-827d-49d6-852b-a530c4732e2e","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"fcfb1ec8-82a2-4448-a4d1-7007c48ae90c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Brief Insight / Tutorial","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fcae9d97-7b44-491d-be81-bf078cad2920","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Tracing a Variable's Life","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"34f232bf-e558-4cbc-813d-f5139bbab582","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Consider a script where a variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cfg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" changes over time. The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"definitions","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" system handles it like this:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8a2ec643-f78d-4fc5-82d9-41ee0a00e4f0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Registration","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": A ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cfg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is created via the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b02e9bf1-1291-4bb8-a5e4-2c07654d4cc0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Assignment 1","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": At line 5, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cfg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is assigned a dictionary. A ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PointItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is added to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cfg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" at row 5.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2bf99834-04d1-4ae0-b0e1-8f376bc7043c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Branching","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The analyzer hits an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" statement. The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" begins recording new potential values for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cfg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" at line 10.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"00a2c756-06ef-440c-9b43-3afa0869afe0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Resolution","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Later, when the engine asks \"What could ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cfg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be at line 15?\", the manager looks at the points history, retrieves the correct ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PointItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and follows its links to return the most accurate set of possible values.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"84c4e014-53c1-4e08-8f32-3323e1548da6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This architecture allows Jarvis to be ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"flow-sensitive","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"context-aware","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":", making it capable of detecting complex bugs that simpler, grep-based tools would miss.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fd305426-2dec-45ab-be38-09aedec537b6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
